name: Flashback
description: What if you could bring together the greatest crew Starfleet's history has to offer? Many across the galaxy are taking advantage of the temporal anomaly crisis to do just that - only their aims may tear the galaxy asunder.
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Federation, Klingon, and Section 31 Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Rand, Baris, Bashir, or crew from Star Trek: The Original Series will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Rand, Baris, Bashir, or TOS
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Makull
featured_crew.flavor: Peâ€™Nar was sure that polaric energy would destroy his world, so he sabotaged the plant - leading to the destruction he so feared.

action.name: This Is A Lawful Demonstration

featured_crew.name: Baris
featured_crew.flavor: Baris really wanted to arrest Kirk for wasting grain, but thanks to tribbles he got the opportunity to arrest the one who poisoned the grain.

action.name: Now, I Want You To Keep That Grain Safe
I'm a Doctor, Not a Historian

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Punk
rewards.flavor: A man simply enjoying music on the bus before Spock puts an end to his unkind outbursts.

action.name: I Hate You

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Makull
rewards.flavor: Peâ€™Nar Makull was sure that polaric energy would destroy his world, so he sabotaged the plant - leading to the destruction he so feared.

action.name: This Is A Lawful Demonstration
I'm a Doctor, Not a Historian

action.name: I'm a Doctor, Not a Historian

rewards.name: Baris
rewards.flavor: Baris really wanted to arrest Kirk for wasting grain, but thanks to tribbles he got the opportunity to arrest the one who poisoned the grain.

action.name: Now, I Want You To Keep That Grain Safe

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "Factions across the galaxy are leveraging the temporal anomaly crisis to build up their numbers - and they're courting the best and brightest from across history and across faction lines. Starfleet would be foolish not to follow suit."

"What would an undersecretary of agriculture know about building up crews? Oh, sorry, Captain, I thought this was a secure channel. Surely you must feel the same. Undersecretary Baris is out of his depth pushing for this."

"Your suspicions aren't unwarranted. I can't help wondering what he's getting out of this initiative, though I have a few guesses. Our bigger problem is this recruiting push across faction lines may put not only our enlistment numbers, but also confidential intelligence at risk."
"Yet another thing I was afraid of. It may fall to those of us on the ground, so to speak, to look into this and find out what's really going on. You'll help us out, won't you, Captain?"

"Factions across the galaxy are leveraging the temporal anomaly crisis to build up their numbers - and they're courting the best and brightest from across history and across faction lines. Starfleet would be foolish not to follow suit."

"What would an undersecretary of agriculture know about building up crews? Oh, sorry, Captain, I thought this was a secure channel. Surely you must feel the same. Undersecretary Baris is out of his depth pushing for this."

"Your suspicions aren't unwarranted. I can't help wondering what he's getting out of this initiative, though I have a few guesses. Our bigger problem is this recruiting push across faction lines may put not only our enlistment numbers, but also confidential intelligence at risk."
"Yet another thing I was afraid of. It may fall to those of us on the ground, so to speak, to look into this and find out what's really going on. You'll help us out, won't you, Captain?"
